charinfo.name: Hachibi Bee (S)
charinfo.description: Hachibi Bee (S) has complete control of the Hachibi within him. This allows Bee to use all forms of the Hachibi's power at will making him a true killer shinobi.

abilities.name: Chakra Bones
abilities.description: Hachibi Bee (S) uses Chakra Bones. Hachibi Bee gains 10% unpierceable damage reduction permanently and will also deal an additional 5 damage permanently when this skill is used. Hachibi Bee can only use Chakra Bones 5 times and this skill is permanent.

abilities.name: Lariat
abilities.description: Hachibi Bee (S) targets 1 enemy dealing 20 damage. For 1 turn that enemy's stamina is depleted, if that enemy uses a skill the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn.

abilities.name: Tailed Beast Bomb
abilities.description: Hachibi Bee (S) uses Tailed Beast Bomb on 1 enemy dealing 25 damage. This skill cannot be reflected.

abilities.name: Jinchuuriki Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Hachibi Bee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
